bibl.title: Ben cao gang mu dictionary Vol1

sense.def: ① Pathological Condition identical with dian 癲 , peak-illness. Ben cao gang mu 本草綱目 Substance Entry qiu shi 秋石 , fu fang 附 方 , attached recipes: 有人病顛腹鼓，日久加喘滿，垂困，亦服此而安也 , “If someone suffers from peak[-illness] and abdominal drum, to which panting and a feeling of fullness are added after an extended period, as well as difficulties in sleeping, then have him ingest this too, and he will be calmed down”.

②The uppermost part of a structure. Cha jing Book on tea. Tang era, ca. 756~760. 茶經 Lj: 茱萸出芳樹顛，鯉魚出洛水泉 , “ Zhu yu originates from the top of fragrant trees; li yu originates from the spring of the Luo river”.
